ej,rubes101,C,crawj901,Fan interference non-call ej,robed102,P,crawj901,Call in LF $the ball caromed of the wall; the Cardinals wanted fan interference on the play while the Padres thought it was a home run; Cardinals Coach Sonny Ruberto and Padres Dave Roberts ejected by HP umpire Jerry Crawford

$pitch out on suicide squeeze

$Gonzalez retreated to 1st when Buckner moved away from base to check on runner on 3rd
$Larry Cox split middle two fingers of right hand
$Willie Stargell spiked by Broderick Perkins
$1B umpire Harry Wendelstedt, covering the plate when HP umpire Ed Montague ran to 3B, was knocked down when Wayne Garrett slid across HP
